job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: <p><strong><em><u>Job Description</u></em></strong></p><p>Major purpose: This engineer will need experience in SW design, digital communications, modems, and FPGA design.</p><p><br></p><p><strong><em><u>Areas of desired experience or education include:</u></em></strong></p><p>• Forward Error Correction (FEC)</p><p>• Modulation</p><p>• Demodulation</p><p>• Digital filters</p><p>• Baseband sampling</p><p>• Acquisition</p><p>• Tracking Algorithms</p><p><br></p><p><strong><em><u>Major functions: Technical/Functional skills: Education/Experience/Licenses etc.:	Qualifications:</u></em></strong></p><p>• Bachelor’s (Master’s preferred) degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Software Engineering or Electrical Engineering.</p><p>• 4+ years of experience implementing complex modem algorithms in DSP software.</p><p>• 4+ years of equivalent experience in FPGA design with SW background will also receive consideration</p><p>• Preferred Skills:</p><p>• Expertise in C++ and object-oriented software design</p><p>• Expertise in software design for testability</p><p>• Expertise in laboratory debug techniques using digital scopes, logic analyzers, BERTS &amp; other complex measurement equipment</p><p>• Experience with TI DSP BIOS RTOS is a plus.</p><p>• Familiarity with Git is a plus</p><p>• Familiarity with VHDL/Verilog and Matlab/Simulink is a plus</p><p></p>
